name: toMul_smul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝ : SMul α β
a : Additive α
b : β
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul (Additive.toMul a) b) (HVAdd.hVAdd a b)
decl: @[simp] lemma toMul_smul [SMul α β] (a:Additive α) (b : β) : (a.toMul : α) • b = a +ᵥ b := rfl

name: ofMul_vadd
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝ : SMul α β
a : α
b : β
⊢ Eq (HVAdd.hVAdd (Additive.ofMul a) b) (HSMul.hSMul a b)
decl: @[simp] lemma ofMul_vadd [SMul α β] (a : α) (b : β) : ofMul a +ᵥ b = a • b := rfl

name: toAdd_vadd
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝ : VAdd α β
a : Multiplicative α
b : β
⊢ Eq (HVAdd.hVAdd (Multiplicative.toAdd a) b) (HSMul.hSMul a b)
decl: @[simp] lemma toAdd_vadd [VAdd α β] (a:Multiplicative α) (b : β) : (a.toAdd : α) +ᵥ b = a • b := rfl

name: ofAdd_smul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝ : VAdd α β
a : α
b : β
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul (Multiplicative.ofAdd a) b) (HVAdd.hVAdd a b)
decl:
@[simp] lemma ofAdd_smul [VAdd α β] (a : α) (b : β) : ofAdd a • b = a +ᵥ b := rfl

-- Porting note: I don't know why `one_smul` can do without an explicit α and `mul_smul` can't.

name: Additive.vaddCommClass
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
γ : Type u_4
inst✝² : SMul α γ
inst✝¹ : SMul β γ
inst✝ : SMulCommClass α β γ
⊢ VAddCommClass (Additive α) (Additive β) γ
decl:
instance Additive.vaddCommClass [SMul α γ] [SMul β γ] [SMulCommClass α β γ] :
    VAddCommClass (Additive α) (Additive β) γ :=
  ⟨@smul_comm α β _ _ _ _⟩

name: Multiplicative.smulCommClass
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
γ : Type u_4
inst✝² : VAdd α γ
inst✝¹ : VAdd β γ
inst✝ : VAddCommClass α β γ
⊢ SMulCommClass (Multiplicative α) (Multiplicative β) γ
decl:
instance Multiplicative.smulCommClass [VAdd α γ] [VAdd β γ] [VAddCommClass α β γ] :
    SMulCommClass (Multiplicative α) (Multiplicative β) γ :=
  ⟨@vadd_comm α β _ _ _ _⟩
